entry.desc: post processing location relative to the SRCROOT

Path to the post processing python virtual environment created by the create_python_env.sh script in the postprocessing directory. The create_python_env.sh script is run once per CESM source code installation.

If TRUE, create the single variable time series files using the history time slice files. All the time invariant metadata is included in each variable time series file header. Rules for how the tseries files are created are specified in the env_archive.xml file.

If TRUE, this calls the AMWG diagnostics package parallel python wrapper script to generate climatological plots associated with the run job output. See the AMWG diagnostics documentation for more details.
